lyrics.text:
Kainga lotu, omi ‘o mamata
Toka ‘a e ‘Eiki he ‘ai’angakai;
Tu’i ‘o Langi ne hoko ‘o tangata!
Mou omi ke tau lotu, mo fakafeta’i.

Taau ke hiva ‘a e kau ‘āngelo na,
Hiki mavava hou’eiki ‘o langi,
Tuku kolōlia ki he ‘Afiona.
Mou omi ke tau lotu, mo fakafeta’i.

Hiki mavava, fai ‘a e fakamālō,
Ki he ‘Afio ne ‘alo’i ‘anenai.
Hoko ‘a Folofola ‘o kakano!
Mou omi ke tau lotu, mo fakafeta’i.
